Improvements.Improvement: Use of Java Logging instead of System.out.println
Improvements.Description: Instead of using System.out.println for logging, use java.util.logging.Logger for a more flexible and maintainable approach. This allows for various logging levels and better control of where the logging goes. We should replace all instances of System.out.println with Logger calls.
Instead of catching general NumberFormatException and ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException, provide more specific error messages for each case to improve debugging. This can be applied to the catch blocks.
